Crafted a malicious URL containing a request to a vulnerable server, such as http://vulnerable-server.com/admin, and submitted it to the application's URL parameter
Submitted the crafted URL to the application
Application sent the request to the vulnerable server and displayed its response, confirming the vulnerability
Researched the server's configuration and available resources
Crafted a suitable URL containing the desired resource and submitted it to the application's URL parameter
Server successfully executed the request and displayed the flag for the Web Exploitation challenge
